content:
West Elm is a great choice! They have a wonderful selection of lamp shades that can elevate the style of your dining room table lamps. Since you've already checked out their options recently, you must have a good idea of what they have to offer.

Before you head back to West Elm, you might want to:

1. Take a photo of your lamp with your phone to reference the size, shape, and style when you're browsing lamp shades.
2. Measure the lamp's harp (the metal piece that holds the shade) to ensure you get a shade that fits properly.
3. Think about the color palette and style of your dining room to narrow down your options.

When you're at West Elm, don't hesitate to ask the sales associates for assistance. They can help you find the perfect shade, and they might even have some design tips or recommendations.

Remember to check if they have any sales or promotions going on, and don't forget to look for any online coupons or discounts that might be applicable to your purchase.

Good luck, and I hope you find the perfect lamp shade to refresh your dining room!
